website_summaries.verdict: TCL's 6-Series of 4K TVs is a worthy successor to last year's excellent P-Series, and stands as one of the best values currently available.
pros: Plenty of streaming apps and services on Roku TV

website_summaries.verdict: The TCL 55DP648 is a good looking and affordable TV if you're looking for a large set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. Although the TV offers a decent colour gamut and a quick response time for gaming, it's let down by a plethora of problems elsewhere. Namely we're talking about the dramatic lack of brightness and poor viewing angles.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money 4K HDR TV on the market
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Value for money. 4K 43" with HDR 10 for only £349? - Vibrant colours, sharp display and low input lag - A good looking TV - Easy to set up - Freeview play Cons: - Interface is a bit slow - Wide stand - Speakers are poor If you are looking for a TV with these specifications, you won't find better value for money anywhere and that's why i'm giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money, some room for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is superb and build seems reasonable. As noted in other reviews, the viewing angles aren't great so consider this before buying but if this isn't a concern the picture quality should be hard to beat anywhere near the price range. Very minor lag issue on sound, barely noticable. The software is somewhat slow and clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 65" - Uniformity issues, panel bleed and potentially warped screen.
customer_reviews.text: 65" - £599 - Massive uniformity issues two noticeable dark zones on the screen result in picture quality which is unacceptable and are visible at all times however exacerbated during white scenes. These make some scenes unwatchable. Also has severe panel bleed and potentially warped screen. Panel bleed runs along the entire lower edge and is really bad in the lower left corner of the screen. I also believe that the screen is warped as when viewed from the side the top half of the screen is angled backwards slightly, possibly designed that way but more than likely a further fault. Could not possibly recommend when I have requested a refund and will not be risking a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K HDR set for basic needs at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this TV in my bedroom, hooked up to a PS4 Pro and soundbar. I play games on this and watch Netflix and for these purposes, the TV is great. Absolutely no complaints here - all I care is about getting a decent picture when watching movies and playing games in 4K HDR and this TV does that.
customer_reviews.author: Manij Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the jump to 4K.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking TV. The pictures online don't do it justice. Very sleek design. The depth of colour and sharpness of picture are fantastic. My xbox one x appreciates the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is worst than poor
customer_reviews.text: The design of the Tele was smart and stylish but the picture was a huge let down. Colours were bland dull and seemed grey over all. 4k picture was good but the HDR well there didn't seem to be one. I have another 4k tv by a more well known brand and the difference is like day and night. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S.Blu

customer_reviews.title: This tv doesn’t work with Alexa and has no t browser
customer_reviews.text: great price, superb picture in 4K for movies threw my movie box, great on HD channels when not in HD the picture goes light and dark, ideal for using as my laptop screen threw HDMI connection, great sound threw extra Bose cinema system overall I have 55" model its well worth the money for this size, when its on the wall looks cool and slim everyone comments on it. Alexa doesn’t work and it has no t browser anymore
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality and style, poor everything else.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok t.v. The picture quality is pretty good but that's about it. The sound is bad, very tinny and no bass at all, I had to get a sound bar so it sounds good. The OS is very bad it takes a couple of seconds to register when you use the remote so using a t.v stick or box would be a good idea. Now the good stuff the picture quality is pretty good for a cheap t.v, it works really well with an old Xbox one in hd but yet to try out the 4k for gaming. It also looks very stylish, being very slim and a nice silver colour but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew combs

customer_reviews.title: 50 inch TV review
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had any issues with the TV thus far. We got the 50 inch and use it for gaming and movies and the picture quality is better than anything Ive had before. We also loved the fact this tv was in our budget. We looked at a lot of tvs in the stores but didn't want to spend the money. It was tough making the choice to buy a tv online, but overall it was cost effective and a great investment because we use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Bun

customer_reviews.title: Competent basic TV
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, responsive though basic. Typical picture for edglit LED - poor dynamic range with grey pattern instead of black but ok for normal viewing. Apparently wide colour gamut which is a plus. Most irritating aspect is the primitive, uninformative TV guide.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: image is good, sound below average
customer_reviews.text: Image is of high quality, sound is not that good, software is bad. For example: when I use extrenal speakers, I hear 2 sounds, one from TV another one from external speakers. I believe it should be simple to solve it with a software update, but when I searched on internet, it was a problem already present at least from 2016, so it seems the company has no intention to solve the software problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality --- Not bad for the price point, there are random flickers though so overall not great. Audio --- Really bad, not much better than phone speakers through a pringles tube. Well it's simple you might think, i'll get a soundbar and all will be good. If only that was the case, however there's a 100 - 200ms audio delay as well. If the audio delay and smart TV interface were improved this would be a great buy. As it stands I would look at other alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 4k
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price and screen size, brilliant gaming response on consoles absolutely low lag input .one important thing to take in consideration is that this tv is not a 4K tv, it has 50 inch screen which classifies as 4K resolution but not the actual quality of it. that's why they say in description 4K but its a high definition quality tv but not a licensed 4K telly. But overall its really good, especially if 4K is something not that important for you I'd say this is the right choice to go with.
customer_reviews.author: ykkdeno

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this tv is it broke down after 2 months and I can’t get in touch with the seller as they are not answering my email
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great quality picture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture for the money. Some minor problems connecting on WiFi. But I think a neighbours TV WiFi was interfering with mine as it kept defaulting to that one instead of mine. Pity there was no record to HDD function but I guess they have concentrated on picture quality rather than connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Slow to start when turned on
customer_reviews.text: Slow to start when turned on LED on front hard to know if the TV is on or off on switch on because BLACK SCREEN for twenty seconds and the LED goes Off Contacted TCL BUT NO REAL HELP RECEIVED!!!
customer_reviews.author: TrafficProducer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK wide colour gamut is good but that's it
customer_reviews.text: TV is OK very budget wide colour gamut is noticeable but rest of the TV is absolute garbage. Menu is terrible and controller is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: SHORYUKEN!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my gaming room, love it. Needed minimal input delay for my fighting games and it does the trick. Added some cheap LED lights onto the back (also bought off Amazon) for a slick look!
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Image quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I was unlucky and received a crap TV or all TV's from this brand ( TCL ) are like this. I give you my word that my first TV from 1998 was better than this . Image quality very poor, colour - if you can call those colours - ridiculous Maybe just bed luck. Now in stage of return. I will see if they will be fast with the returning process... This TV ruin my Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Farcas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture Quality, Quick Response Time. Excellent For 4K Gaming....
customer_reviews.text: Only 60Hz but most monitors are! I'm used to 140Hz so i do notice a slight difference... The bottom gets a bit warm for my liking they should have used a power pack instead maybe... 🚫(Do Not Block The Bottom Vents With Your Sound Bar!).🚫 🤢And Never Eat Yellow Snow!🤮
customer_reviews.author: Gazza'Wales'Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice tv.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is good. Excellent value, cause freeview, YouTube etc easily. Set up was easy. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: For the money you cannot get a better television than this. The menu system is a little clunky but I mainly have it hooked up to my pc so it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit slow in some areas. Need go be able to a just the sound to make it louder than the setting's.
customer_reviews.author: mon. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for gaming!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price! To get 4k HDR active you need to go into the system settings and turn HDMI 2.0 on. Sound could be a little better. Amazing picture!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Parker

customer_reviews.title: One happy biy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic picture, my son spent his birthday money on this and loves it for playing his x box on
customer_reviews.author: Booseybird

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best 4k hdr Pro 10 tele but does the job for the price. Could have easier instructions to understand.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatMan

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months back and now getting screen flicker problem. Also, inbuild apps like Netflix stop working many times and I have reset it again to make it work. I tried to reaching customer service on multiple occasions during their working hours by phone but couldn't get through.
customer_reviews.author: Mukesh Rawat

customer_reviews.title: I will never use a TCL again
customer_reviews.text: arrived without a support leg, without a power cable and with problems with the Smart view connection !! a TV that was not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Kevin prando

customer_reviews.title: Good Tv but a little delicate make the price £350 again
customer_reviews.text: Great tv, bang for you buck, sadly my brother broke it and now I’m trying to buy it back but I’m having bad luck as the prices keep going up and down and to make matters worse the item keeps being taken of the site, due to that I have to find another TV or seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking TV, after a bit of research decided this TV looked to be good value. Apparently the US spec TVs are better than the UK ones, that didn't put me off. It's early days but think I made a good choice
customer_reviews.author: DY83

customer_reviews.title: Check software
customer_reviews.text: The tv came with out of date. Software. It has. So far took me 5 hours on phone. trying to get some one to solve. Problem The manufacturer. Has now decided to send engineer Why is Amazon. Selling new out of date. Tv I hope I don’t have send it back
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hill

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB PICTURE, GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: ASTONISHING TV. EVERYTHINICG LOOKS FANTASTIC. A DEFINITE THUMBS UP. A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MCMULLEN

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for £299
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the bedroom, my only disappointment is that you cannot my preferred channels into a favourites group.
customer_reviews.author: C J Hewson

customer_reviews.title: Volume too low.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this TV. Volume is too low. Also the app store does not have many apps for example no Amazon Prime Video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Checked reviews before buying as i’d Not heard of this make before,and I was wary as it seemed cheap. But took a chance and bought it,excellent picture,easy set up and well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great television
customer_reviews.text: Lived up to expectations wasn’t sure about this tv at first but this has to be the best tv for the money compared to any other make like for like with all the same specs.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Coulborn

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: 3 dead pixels and really obvious can't ignore them so really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MR BRYAN OHARA

customer_reviews.title: Not 4K
customer_reviews.text: Its not true 4K, I brought this for my Xbox one and it's safe to say I won't be buying another TV from this company, there's options out there from known brands for TRUE 4K for the same amount of money
customer_reviews.author: EDrew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tv. Colour is great. To boost the sound I’d recommend getting speaker. But I dare anyone to find a better tv for the price
customer_reviews.author: Scott Waine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Tv, Excellent panel for the price. The App Store is rubbish but hopefully an update will sort that out. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great gaming TV and great for movie viewing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV mainly for playing the ps4 but also for Netflix, Input lag is low playing on the ps4 and picture quality is great I can't fault this TV, great purchase
customer_reviews.author: irene whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Sensor need updating but worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is very good but when I try to change channels its very slow to respond and sometimes go to channels you never choose.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for £
customer_reviews.text: This wont stand up to a £1000 TV but not far off, great for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: MR ANDREW OLIVER RUMNEY

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPING WAS WEEKS LATE AND THEN NO POWER PLUG! SHOCKING
customer_reviews.text: DIDN'T COME WITH BATTERIES FOR THE REMOTE OR A POWER PLUG. Literally no power plug, like WTF
customer_reviews.author: all4thegoolife

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for money but ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, remote is disappointing. But the look and quality is good . Good for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Jack hayward

customer_reviews.title: Delayed audio (unfixable)
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the audio is totally delayed and so, for me, it’s unwatchable. I foolishly bought it before I moved into my new place so only just set it up (after the one month return window) so I doubt I’ll be able to get a refund now. It’s fruatrating though. If you make a tv, surely there shouldn’t be issues with audio delay!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Image and sound out of synchronisation
customer_reviews.text: Netflix, Youtube, and Freeview are unusable due to a lag in the sound with respect to the image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The colour quality on that TV is awesome, I've seen OLED tvs before and LCD ones, and I can definitely tell the colours are magnificent on this one being an LCD panel. I got this TV to play 4K content on my PS4, I didn't notice any lag so far and it's just so good for the money. I also watch HD movies on it, and it's really beautiful compared to my previous TV and monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrillos Michael

customer_reviews.title: Solid budget tv
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 HDMI ports and app availability is lacking (I'm in Ireland not sure if that makes a difference) but apart from that no complaints functions perfectly and has great image quality and pretty good sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY/REPAIR INFO???
customer_reviews.text: TV is Great Value - But paperwork does not provide any warranty details or contact details/phone number for warranty etc.. Item listing says it has 2 years onsight warranty but have not been given any info re same.. A bit confusing...
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not the same you read from reviews around
customer_reviews.text: If you come here to buy this TV after reading american sites on the 6 series, beware - it is completely different TV. In terms of image, I imagine it is similar, since image is really good. But it has no Roku, it has a TCL system which is really bad, the apps it has (just 10) are really crap. The TV is really slow, when I press the settings buttons, I have to wait 2 minutes, everything is slow in this TV. Audio is not that good. I would recommend to buy another TV from past year. The casting capabilities are very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Martins

customer_reviews.title: Proves that 4k, doesn't have to cost 4k
customer_reviews.text: First off, yes I know that some people are saying this tv is rubbish. That the sound is awful act. Picture could be better. Colours look washed out. Let me just say, that personally I think this is a great 4k tv, without the ridiculous price tag. The picture is superb. Vibrant colours, and crisp graphics for gaming. The sound is fine for me. No worse than other TV's I've owned. I honestly couldn't be happier with this tv. Thank you tcl, for not charging silly money, for a high quality of 4k.
customer_reviews.author: marston

product_meta.title: TCL 55DP648 55 Inch 4K Ultra HD HDR 10 Smart TV with Freeview Play (2018/2019 Model) - Silver
product_meta.description:
Size Name:55 Inch| Style Name:TV onlyP648 Series combines Ultra Slim Metal Design, 4K HDR Pro Picture quality, and a Wide Color Gamut combined with a 10-bit panel to provide intense and ultra-realistic colours of digital cinema. 

Access to 7 Day catch up and on demand services are possible thanks to FREEVIEW PLAY and SMART TV 3.0. Designed for those who do not want to compromise between elegance, image quality and easy access to the content they love. 

The P648 Series will blend into your interior and let all members of your family enjoy their favorite content in an exceptional image quality.

BOX CONTAINS
Television
feature_bullets: The Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) resolution is 4 times greater than Full HD. Never miss a single detail, be part of the action!
Design: An ultra-thin body (9.9 mm) and ultra-thin frame (5 mm), gives full space to the image and will blend perfectly into your interior.
HDR PRO: unrivalled blacks, higher contrast and vivid colours - including HDR10 and HLG
Wide Colour Gamut combined with a 10 Bit Panel: Reproduces 30% purer and richer colours than traditional LED screens. Providing Cinema quality colours at home.

TCL SMART: Includes Netflix, Youtube and Freeview Play: Freeview Play provides 7 Day Catch Up through your programme guide and On Demand apps such as BBC iPlayer, the ITV Hub, All 4, Demand 5, UKTV Play through your existing TV aerial and home WIFI connection.
2 Year Warranty: Provides ONSITE HOME Repair for all 43"+ TCL UK TV's.
